name: Future Dungeons
overview: Described by some as Flappy Wizard, this single player, side view platformer where you walk, fly and glide your way through dungeons picking up the emeralds. But some are behind gates, trigger the proper gates to make sure you can access all the emeralds on the screen so you can move to the next one. But time is not on your side, so you must hurry. Published in 64'er 1991/04, and in 64'er Sonderheft 79.
